content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Vjosa Osmani

is the incumbent president of Kosovo since her inauguration on 4 April 2021.]]
The number of visits per country where President Osmani traveled as of October 1, 2025 are:
* One visit to Brunei, Colombia, Costa Rica,  El Salvador, Estonia, Greece, Iceland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Malaysia, Moldova, Panama, Saudi Arabia,  Spain, Thailand, Tunisia and United Arab Emirates.
* Two visits to Canada, Belgium, Denmark, Finland,  Hungary, Poland, Portugal, Singapore, and the United Kingdom.
* Three visits to Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Italy, Japan, Slovenia and Vatican City.
* Four visits to Montenegro, North Macedonia, Qatar and Switzerland
* Five visits to Austria.
* Six visits to  France and Turkey.
* Eight visits to Albania and Germany.
* Seventeen visits to the United States.
